name: Cilantro Soy Paste
description: This spiced Asian mixture makes a good marinade for chicken, shrimp or oily fish like bluefish, bass, tuna and swordfish. Cover with the paste for three hours before grilling and turn frequently. Before grilling over hot coals, wipe off excess marinade.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Process until smooth, stopping as needed to scrape sides of the blender.
